summary.label: Summary
summary.text: Creative, good listener, hardworking person, eager to learn and contribute with the company's teams. Continuously improving the quality of the work, including soft skills such as organization and communication.

list.text: C, Java, Python, Julia, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, PHP,  HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React, Git, SQL
Strong experience using Julia and Flux ML. Built a reinforcement learning library using bit neural networks
Adept to the clean code philosophy for producing legible codes
Skilled in web development building responsible websites
Used to write automated tests with Travis CI and Codecov
Used to plan softwares before development through the use of UML diagrams and other diagrams
Advanced english. Went to Canada in a student exchange program in 2020

list.title: Technical Development Scholar
bullets: Quickly learned new skills and applied them to daily tasks improving efficiency and productivity on the work.
Used PHP, jQuery, Wordpress, Bootstrap, Git and other tools to create a website.
Built solutions for accessibility, such as accessible presentations and an accessibility bar for people with vision disabilities.

list.title: Scholar
bullets: Produced two articles, one about software translation and another one about accessible presentations. Both were mainly focused on accessibility.
Proactivity proposing new solutions to reduce the amount of work, such as a web scraper to avoid manual data extraction.

list.title: Bachelor of Science: Computer Science
list.company: Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro
bullets: Favorite area of study: Data science and artificial intelligence
8th semester. Due to the university pause for the Covid-19 pandemic, the actual semester is the 6th
Graduation estimated for the 2nd semester of 2022
Classes are often from 8 to noon

list.title: IT Technician: Information Technology
bullets: Final project: A fast-food management system using MySQL, Java and WebSockets with a touchscreen friendly GUI

list.title: Student Researcher: Research Group
bullets: Mainly working with reinforcement learning and HPC solutions for low-end hardware, such as bit neural networks

other.label: Other
list: Presented a project about matrix multiplication with CUDA at Regional School of High Performance Computing of Rio de Janeiro (ERAD-RJ) in 2019
Presented a project about bit neural networks at Regional School of High Performance Computing of Rio de Janeiro (ERAD-RJ) in 2020
Presented a project about software translation at National Technology and Science Week of the UFRRJ (SNCT/UFRRJ) in 2020
Wrote a paper about digital accessibility for presentations in National Technology and Science Week of the UFRRJ (SNCT/UFRRJ) in 2020
